entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Terrace Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:11 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terrace Bay 1:00 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
Temperature: -1.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -2.4°C
Wind: 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of freezing drizzle. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 9.
